description: Try our easy to follow Pistachio Ice Cream recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pistachio Ice Cream Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Scoop the ice cream into dessert glasses, sprinkle with chopped pistachios, and serve immediately.
